column3: Debut game for Chase Utley
Phillies Kevin Millwood left the game due to an injured groin

ej,bowal001,M,millb901,Call at 1B $Phillies manager Larry Bowa argued with 1B umpire Bill Miller about the call on Bobby Abreu; Bowa told Miller that he had missed two plays in the game; Bowa was ejected by Miller
ej,cox-b103,M,danlk901,Called third strike on Sheffield ej,shefg001,P,danlk901,Called third strike Gary Sheffield and manager Bobby Cox ejected by HP umpire Kerwin Danley
Phillies Vicente Padilla left the game due to an injured arm
Debut game for Jerome Williams
Giants Benito left with injured arm from HP
Astros Wade Miller left the game due to an injured leg
ej,gracm001,P,hollm901,Called third strike Diamondbacks Mark Grace ejected by HP umpire Matt Hollowell
Houston broke finger fouling off bunt, then got a hit; onto DL next day, pin in finger
Mets Roberto Alomar left the game due to an injured leg
41 minute delay during game
Mariners Jeff Cirillo left the game due to an injured knee; Cirillo ran into fence chasing Bell's foul in bottom 4th
48 minute delay during game
Athletics Chris Singleton left the game due to an injured back

ej,cox-b103,M,culbf901,Balls and strikes (Foul tip non-call) $Braves manager Cox ejected by 1B umpire Culbreth for arguing that 2-2 pitch to Bell was a foul tip caught for strike 3; umpire initially agreed, but Phillies manager Bowa challenged that; umpires consulted and changed call, leading to Cox ejection
ej,bowal001,M,craft901,Balls and strikes Phillies manager Larry Bowa ejected by HP umpire Terry Craft after 1-2 pitch to Lopez
ej,bowal001,M,tscht901,Balls and strikes Phillies Manager Larry Bowa ejected by HP umpire Tim Tschida
Expos Rocky Biddle left the game due to an injured back
$Dave Roberts called for interference
Steady rain fell throughout game, hard in 5th and 6th
originally D9, changed to E9 on 9-04-2003!
ej,larut101,M,davig901,Demanding ejection after HBP Cardinals Manager Tony Larussa ejected by 3B umpire Gerry Davis
Throw dropped at 3rd and Lieberthal then went to 2nd
ej,vidrj001,P,fichm901,Balls and strikes Expos Jose Vidro ejected by HP umpire Mike Fichter
ej,bowal001,M,marqa901,Balls and strikes Phillies Manager Larry Bowa ejected by HP umpire Alfonso Marquez
ej,bowal001,M,barkl901,Warning to pitcher HP umpire Lance Barksdale warned both teams; Phillies Manager Larry Bowa argued and was ejected by Barksdale
$Game was scheduled for 7:05, but was moved to 1:05 in anticipation of Hurricane Isabel
8 minute delay during game
Debut game for Ryan Madson
Debut game for Andy Machado
2 minute delay during game
Strange. Ball went past 1st baseman, hit runner, bounced back to 1st baseman who beat Rollins to bag
The pitch to DeRosa hit his hand, but it was ruled a swing.  He left in much pain, X-rays showed no break
